thread.section_title: SIXTY LES - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent!
thread.title_full: Excellent! - Review of SIXTY LES, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: williamjbrown11
title: Excellent!
text: I recently stayed here because I've heard so many great things about the Thompson properties in NYC. I loved the neighborhood. Walking distance to anything you need. We were pleasantly greeted by Eva at the front desk and she was able to upgrade us to a studio. The room was amazing and extremely clean everyday. I'd definitely recommend this hotel and I can't wait to return!
